llm.feedback:
Up | 3–6 months | EU autos relief proceeding promptly on implementing legislation reduces tariff pass-through risk | Watch progress on implementing EU autos relief legislation and any exemptions that would tighten pass-through | Probability 50% (RHFWI02JT)

Up | 12–24 months | Diversification via UK DCTS and Asia cumulation reduces pass-through pressure and supports margins | Watch the timing of UK DCTS rollout and Asia cumulation expansion | Probability 20–30% (WLXM1819K)

Down | 6–12 months | Tariff escalation or broader enforcement sustains a higher cost base | Watch sustained tariff actions and DOJ enforcement posture | Probability 15–25% (OFY11YO0I)(AJTHKYXQ3)

Down | 6–12 months | Cross-border frictions and input-cost uplift keep margins compressed in autos/industrial sectors | Watch Japan anti-dumping probes and broader tariff pass-through dynamics | Probability 15–25% (2SJORBV6H)(Scraped Source 2)
